sentences.sContent: This job is so boring. I wish I could do something more creative.
sentences.sCn: 这工作太单调了，我希望能做些更有创造性的事情。

sentences.sContent: I teach creative writing at Trinity College.
sentences.sCn: 我在三一学院教创意写作。

sentences.sContent: the creative process of writing a poem
Diaghilev did his great creative work in France.
sentences.sCn: 狄亚格列夫在法国编创了富有创新性的伟大作品。

sentences.sContent: a creative solution to the problem
sentences.sCn: 这一问题的创新性解决方法

sentences.sContent: ...His creative force is seen in products such as the iPod...
...was a deeper lesson about the nature of creative criticism...
...Team up with your own group and see how creative you can get...
...They're willing to do the hard work of identifying their valuable skills; be creative about where and how to look; learn how to present themselves to potential employers; and keep going...
...This generally includes any creative field such as art...

phrases.pCn: 创意设计，创新设计；美工设计
创意总监；创作总监；艺术总监
创造性表达（如绘画、工艺等表现）
创造性破坏；创造性毁灭

words.tran: 特别创造说；创造宇宙说

trans.tranOther: involving the use of imagination to produce new ideas or things
